plot: Faye disappears with all the money on Bebop. Ed tries to find her and discovers a "Code Name Julia" on Jupiter's moon, Callisto, which makes Spike believe that it's his Julia.

Faye cleans out the crew's safe and leaves the Bebop. While Jet chases after her, Spike decides to follow some clues about a woman named Julia instead, which leads him to another confrontation with Vicious and his old comrade Lin. Meanwhile, Faye meets a sax player named Gren who also knows Julia.—Anonymous
